org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Interface CompletionNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleFormattedCompletionNotifier, VelocityCompletionNotifier

    public interface CompletionNotifier
    How to convert a notification about the completion of a job into a message.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName() 
      String makeCompletionMessage(String name, RemoteRunDelegate run, int code)
      Called to get the content of a message that a workflow run has finished.
      String makeMessageSubject(String name, RemoteRunDelegate run, int code)
      Called to get the subject of the message to dispatch.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of this notifier.

      • makeCompletionMessage

        String makeCompletionMessage(String name,
                             RemoteRunDelegate run,
                             int code)
        Called to get the content of a message that a workflow run has finished.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the run.
        run - What run are we talking about.
        code - What the exit code was.
        Returns:
        The plain-text content of the message.

      • makeMessageSubject

        String makeMessageSubject(String name,
                          RemoteRunDelegate run,
                          int code)
        Called to get the subject of the message to dispatch.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the run.
        run - What run are we talking about.
        code - What the exit code was.
        Returns:
        The plain-text subject of the message.
